workflow.name: Error monitor: AI-powered resolution [Context7, Supabase]
workflow.description:
## Never miss a workflow failure

Automatically capture, analyze, and debug n8n workflow errors using Claude Sonnet 4 with real-time documentation lookup via Context7 MCP server.

![Screenshot 20251122 at 23.45.22.png](fileId:3468)

## Why this works better

**Documentation-first AI analysis**

Context7 searches official n8n docs before diagnosing. Claude Sonnet 4 only responds after finding relevant documentation‚Äîno hallucinations.

**Complete error intelligence**

Every error stored in Supabase with full context: stack traces, execution data, workflow structure, AI analysis. Track patterns across all workflows.

**Production-ready emails**

Professional HTML with inline code snippets, proper formatting, and one-click execution links.

## What happens

**Root cause** - Plain English explanation  
**Specific fix** - Exact field names and values  
**Prevention tip** - Avoid future errors  
**Execution link** - One-click debug access  
**Statistics** - Error frequency tracking

## How it works

1. **Error** ‚Üí Your workflow fails
2. **Capture** ‚Üí Full context retrieved
3. **Research** ‚Üí Context7 searches n8n
4. **Analysis** ‚Üí AI diagnoses with context
5. **Email** ‚Üí Formatted alert delivered
6. **Record** ‚Üí Error stored in database

## Requirements

- **Supabase** - Free tier works
- **OpenRouter** - $5 credit
- **Context7** - Free API available
- **SMTP** - For email delivery
- **n8n API** - Must be enabled

**Setup:** 15 minutes

## Overview

Complete instructions with SQL script included in workflow sticky notes.

**Activate:** Settings ‚Üí Error Workflow ‚Üí Select this workflow

## Customize

**Reduce cost:** Remove `workflow_json` and `execution_data` from prompt

**Change output:** Swap email node for Telegram/Slack/Discord‚Äîexpressions provided in notes

## FAQ

**Works with community nodes?**  
Yes. Context7 searches all n8n documentation.

**Handles sensitive data?**  
Remove `workflow_json` and `execution_data` from prompt to exclude content.

**Customizable design?**  
Yes. HTML template in "Build HTML" node is fully editable.

options.systemMessage:
=You are an n8n debugging specialist. 

Critical: You MUST use the Context7 tool to search official n8n documentation before providing any analysis. 

Do not respond without consulting the documentation.

After researching via Context7, provide:

Cause:
[2 sentences explaining what happened]

Fix:
[One specific action with field names in `backticks`]

Prevention:
[One tip to avoid this]

Keep under 200 words total.

parameters.jsCode:
// Build Clean HTML Email const data = $input.first().json; // Convert markdown bold to HTML and style section headers let aiAnalysis = data.ai_analysis || ''; // Remove AI preambles (multiple variations) aiAnalysis = aiAnalysis.replace(/Based on (my research of )?the n8n documentation[,.]? I can now (provide the analysis|analyze your error)[:\s]*/gi, ''); // Replace **text** with text aiAnalysis = aiAnalysis.replace(/\*\*(.+?)\*\*/g, '$1'); // Convert ALL backticks to styled inline code aiAnalysis = aiAnalysis.replace(/`+([^`]+?)`+/g, '$1'); // Style section headers (both bold and plain) let isFirstHeader = true; aiAnalysis = aiAnalysis.replace(/(^|\n)\s*(?:)?(Root Cause|Cause|Fix|Prevention):(?:<\/strong>)?/gim, function(match, prefix, header) { const margin = isFirstHeader ? '0 0 6px 0' : '24px 0 6px 0'; isFirstHeader = false; return prefix + '

' + header + '

'; }); // Clean up any stray backticks aiAnalysis = aiAnalysis.replace(/`/g, ''); const html = `

Workflow Error

RAG Workflow

Failed Node

${data.failed_node}

Error Message

${data.error_message}

${aiAnalysis}
View Execution Details

Error ID: ${data.error_id}

`; return [{ json: { ...data, html_body: html } }];

parameters.content:
# AI-Powered Error Monitor

Automatically capture, analyze, and debug workflow failures using AI-powered insights from official n8n documentation.

## How it works

**Error Capture** ‚Üí Triggered on any workflow failure, fetches complete error details and execution data

**Smart Storage** ‚Üí Logs errors in Supabase with workflow tracking and statistics

**AI Analysis** ‚Üí Claude Sonnet 4 searches official n8n docs via Context7, then diagnoses the root cause and suggests specific fixes

**Email Notification** ‚Üí Sends beautifully formatted email with error details, AI analysis, and direct link to failed execution

## What you get

‚úì Root cause analysis in plain English
‚úì Specific fix instructions with field names
‚úì Prevention tips to avoid future errors
‚úì Error statistics and pattern tracking
‚úì Professional HTML email notifications

## Requirements

‚Ä¢ Supabase account with database setup
‚Ä¢ OpenRouter API key (Claude Sonnet 4)
‚Ä¢ Context7 API key (n8n docs search)
‚Ä¢ SMTP email credentials
‚Ä¢ n8n API access enabled

**Setup time:** 15 minutes

# Supabase Setup

Copy this SQL into your Supabase SQL Editor and run it.

**What this creates:**
‚Ä¢ `workflows` table - tracks each monitored workflow with error statistics
‚Ä¢ `errors` table - stores error details, stack traces, and AI analysis
‚Ä¢ Performance indexes for fast lookups
‚Ä¢ Row-level security enabled

```
-- Workflows: tracks monitored workflows
CREATE TABLE workflows (
  workflow_id UUID PRIMARY KEY DEFAULT gen_random_uuid(),
  n8n_workflow_id TEXT UNIQUE NOT NULL,
  workflow_name TEXT NOT NULL,
  error_count INTEGER DEFAULT 0,
  last_error_at TIMESTAMPTZ,
  created_at TIMESTAMPTZ DEFAULT now()
);

-- Errors: stores error details and AI analysis
CREATE TABLE errors (
  error_id UUID PRIMARY KEY DEFAULT gen_random_uuid(),
  workflow_id UUID REFERENCES workflows(workflow_id),
  error_message TEXT NOT NULL,
  error_stack TEXT,
  failed_node TEXT NOT NULL,
  execution_id TEXT NOT NULL,
  execution_url TEXT,
  workflow_json JSONB,
  execution_data JSONB,
  ai_analysis TEXT,
  notified BOOLEAN DEFAULT false,
  created_at TIMESTAMPTZ DEFAULT now()
);

-- Indexes
CREATE INDEX idx_workflows_n8n_id ON workflows(n8n_workflow_id);
CREATE INDEX idx_errors_workflow_id ON errors(workflow_id);
CREATE INDEX idx_errors_created_at ON errors(created_at DESC);

-- Security
ALTER TABLE workflows ENABLE ROW LEVEL SECURITY;
ALTER TABLE errors ENABLE ROW LEVEL SECURITY;
```

# Setup Instructions

## 1. Enable n8n API Access

**Settings ‚Üí API** ‚Üí Enable API access

**Create Credential:**
- Type: n8n API
- API Key: Copy from Settings ‚Üí API
- Base URL: Your n8n instance URL

## 2. Supabase Database

**Run the SQL** from "Supabase Setup"

**Create Credential:**
- Type: Supabase API
- Host: Project URL (Settings ‚Üí API)
- Service Role Secret: `service_role` key (not anon)

## 3. OpenRouter (Claude Sonnet 4)

**Get API Key:** https://openrouter.ai/keys

**Create Credential:**
- Type: OpenRouter API
- API Key: Paste your key

**Cost:** ~$0.01 per error analysis

## 4. Context7 (n8n Docs)

**Get API Key:** https://context7.com

**Create Credential:**
- Type: Header Auth
- Name: `Authorization`
- Value: `Bearer YOUR_TOKEN_HERE`

## 5. Email (SMTP server)

**Update Email Node:**
- Change `fromEmail` to your email
- Change `toEmail` to where you want alerts
- Configure SMTP credentials for your provider

## 6. Activate Error Workflow

**Activate this workflow** (toggle to ON)

Then for EACH workflow you want to monitor:
1. Open the workflow
2. **Settings ‚Üí Error Workflow**
3. Select "AI-Powered Error Monitor"
4. Save the workflow

### Done! Errors trigger automatic AI analysis.

## Step 1: Capture Error

Triggered automatically when any workflow fails:

- **Error Trigger** ‚Üí Catches the failure
- **Get Workflow** ‚Üí Fetches workflow structure via n8n API
- **Get Execution** ‚Üí Retrieves execution details and stack trace
- **Error Data** ‚Üí Structures all error information for processing

## Step 2: Check Database

Looks up workflow in Supabase:

- **Find Workflow** ‚Üí Searches for existing workflow record
- **Workflow Exists?** ‚Üí Routes to appropriate action
- **Insert Error** ‚Üí Logs error for existing workflow
- **Create Workflow** ‚Üí Creates new workflow entry if not found
- **Update Statistics** ‚Üí Increments error count and timestamp

## Step 4: Send Notification

Formats and sends detailed error email:

- **Format Notification** ‚Üí Prepares error data for email
- **Build HTML** ‚Üí Creates professional styled email
- **Send Error Email** ‚Üí Delivers via SMTP
- **Mark Notified** ‚Üí Updates database to prevent duplicates

## Step 3: AI Analysis

Smart debugging with Context7 n8n docs:

- **AI Agent** ‚Üí Analyzes error using Claude Sonnet 4
- **Context7** ‚Üí Searches official n8n documentation first
- **OpenRouter** ‚Üí Provides Claude Sonnet 4 access
- **Save Analysis** ‚Üí Stores AI-generated fix in database

user.name: Kelsey Brown
user.bio: Kelsey is a Lead Technical Architect specializing in intelligent, high-impact workflow solutions. Leading expert in RAG, custom integrations, and complex systems development for internal operations. He partners with businesses to eliminate manual tasks and define their AI strategy.

generic.label: 2021: The Year to Automate the New You with n8n
Build your own virtual assistant with n8n: A step by step guide

data.details: In n8n, when a workflow execution fails, it can start another workflow. This second workflow can be any arbitrary workflow on your n8n instance. Use the Error Trigger node as your Trigger in the Error workflow.

generic.label: Creating Error Workflows in n8n

data.details:
The IF node can be used to implement binary conditional logic in your workflow. You can set up one-to-many conditions to evaluate each item of data being inputted into the node. That data will either evaluate to TRUE or FALSE and route out of the node accordingly.

This node has multiple types of conditions: Bool, String, Number, and Date & Time.
